prodNameC: “西門子” A型肝炎免疫球蛋白M抗體檢驗試劑組
ingredientsDesc:
.HAV IgM ReadyPack includes :
(1) Lite Reagent 5.0 ml containing Monoclonal antibody (F(ab)2 fragment; ~0.3 μg/ml) labeled with acridinium ester in buffer with bovine serum albumin, surfactant, sodium azide (<0.1%) and preservatives.
(2) Solid phase 15.0 ml containing streptavidin coated paramagnetic microparticles in buffer with bovine serum albumin, surfactant, sodium azide (<0.1%) and preservatives.
(3) Antigen well reagent 5.0 ml containing inactivated hepatitis A virus (<0.1 μg/ml) in buffer with bovine serum albumin, surfactant, sodium azide (<0.1%), and preservatives. 
(4) Ancillary Reagent 25.0 ml containing biotinylated monoclonal mouse anti-human IgM (~0.500 μg/ml) in buffer with bovine serum albumin, mouse IgG, surfactant, sodium azide (<0.1%), and preservatives.  
(5) HAV IgM calibrator vials: 2.0 ml/vial processed human plasma positive for IgM antibodies to HAV with preservatives.
.HAV IgM quality control material 7.0 ml/via containing l processed human plasma negative and positive for 
Ig
applicantName: 西門子醫療設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市南港區園區街3號2樓之2
efficacy: 定性偵測人體血清或血漿中是否有A型肝炎病毒免疫球蛋白M抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: B 血液學及病理學裝置
